components.label: HTML
components.content: Your welcome page features helpful links which will allow you to start an application or manage your loan.

attrs.value: A person holding a welcome banner. Illustration by Storyset.

components.label: HTML
components.content: Apply early so that you have time to figure out your finances.

components.label: HTML
components.content: In order to manage your loan, please visit the National Student Loan Service Centre (NSLSC).

components.label: HTML
components.content:
For further information, please refer to the StudentAid BC Help Centre.

Or refer to the National Student Loans Service Centre for help.

attrs.value: A person with a headset providing support. Illustration by Storyset.
